bug.author: edouardoyallon
bug.description: fresh clone + cd doc + make html leads to: "WARNING: could not relabel citation reference [paper]" I'm not sure what's the issue.

comments.comment: I think this one is my fault. It appeared when I put in the new paper citation. Will look into it.
Looks like this is related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mcmtroffaes/sphinxcontrib-bibtex/issues/141>mcmtroffaes/sphinxcontrib-bibtex#141</denchmark-link> .
